usage.cn: 如果没有人爱我们，我们也就不会再爱自己了。
usage.eng: We cease loving ourselves if no one loves us.

usage.cn: 世界千万人的失败，都是失败在做事不彻底，往往做到离成功尚差一步就终止不做了
usage.eng: Millions of failures are caused by people who do things not thoroughly. It happens that some people cease or give up when it is just one step before success.
